entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Task.Delay() waits shorter than expected in .NET 7 and 8 #87112
  • .Net 6 performance of CreateSpecificCulture significantly slower than .net framework and .net core 3.1 #87110
    Future
  • Performance regression of XXHash128 for large buffers with .NET 8 #87107
  • AppHost.Bundle.Tests_net8.0_x86 test failed in CI #87102

Closed

  • JIT still emitting helper calls for `typeof` #87109
  • Add a way to wait for a Task without throwing and without allocating #17148
    Future
  • Support await'ing a Task without throwing #22144
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix inline decision reporting + noinline propagation #87115
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix creating cultures with extensions in the name #87114
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Unified to throw NotSupportedException when SendFile() for connectionless sockets #87108
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Fix IDE0001 / IDE0002 (simplify names) in corelib #87106
    area-Meta
  • Fix a few Parse uses to be TryParse #87105
    needs-area-label
  • Superpmi collection for real-world benchmarks #87104
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable async-over-sync FileStream read/writes to be cancelable on Windows #87103
    area-System.IO

Merged

  • Add and use ConfigureAwaitOptions #87067
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] A few cleanups in stack walking on Windows #86917
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure the correct `typeToConvert` parameter is being passed to constructor parameter converters. #87111
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure JsonSerializerOptions always returns a JsonTypeInfo for `object`. #87093
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` set flag in SDK #85245
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Improve codegen for AVX-512 comparisons and general handling of `TYP_MASK` #87089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Add IHostApplicationBuilder interface #86974
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fold obj.GetType to a constant #87101
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #84250
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add back fixed xunit decimal, IntPtr and UIntPtr commented test cases #87084
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Remove unnecessary suppressions in APICompat files #87094
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Save 260k in InitValueNumStoreStatics #85945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • GDV: don't emit fallback call if classes are "exact" #87055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
